Title: The Bear Necessities
Synopsis: Join conservationist Ivan Carter as he seeks solutions to create a balanced wildlife ecosystem!
Summary: Bear research informs biologists how best to protect the species, but gathering data requires collaring them. And the best way is to crawl into their dens while they hibernate and dart them.

Title: Art’s in the Eye of the Bee-Holder
Synopsis: As killer bees invade, one man bravely protects the people, the planet...and the bees.
Summary: Lance discovers a massive hive under the roof of a Palm Springs artist who donates the proceeds of her work to environmental causes. Later, he uncovers a swarm in an unlikely place by a swimming pool.
